text: Tum mein se jo log saahib e fazal (bountiful) aur saahib e maqdarat (means) hain woh is baat ki kasam na kha baithein ke apne rishtedar, miskeen aur muhajir-fi-sabeelillah (who have left their homes for the cause of Allah) logon ki madad na karenge. Unhein maaf kardena chahiye aur darguazar karna chahiye. Kya tum nahin chahte ke Allah tumhein maaf karey? Aur Allah ki siffat yeh hai ke woh gafoor aur raheem hai
